attributes.action: Call for an immediate international inspection of Israel's nuclear weapons sites and facilities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since Israel, unlike Iran, is known to possess these weapons, an immediate and thorough inspection of its nuclear capabilities would help to reassure neighbouring countries, and indeed the whole world, of the non partisan nature of the officially declared intent of the major nuclear powers to get rid of WMDs, including their own, as soon as possible.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Call for an immediate international inspection of Israel's nuclear weapons sites and facilities."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19155


Prime Minister's Office
